ѕубличные методы: run(...) -> RunResult, extract(...) -> DataFrame, transform(df) -> DataFrame, validate(df) -> DataFrame, write(df, output_path) -> WriteResult, register_client(name, client), close_resources()
—войства: config: PipelineConfig, run_id: str, pipeline_name: str, _clients: dict, _logger

ѕубличные методы: fetch_one(request) -> Record, fetch_many(request) -> Iterator, iter_pages(request) -> Iterator, metadata() -> Mapping, close()
